snippet.title: Afterimage Reveal Trailer - A new hand-drawn metroidvania Game | Consoles & PC
snippet.description:
Afterimage on Steam: https://s.team/a/1701520
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/N6WBvZzPtS
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayAfterimage

----------

Afterimage is a hand-drawn metroidvania game set in vast and ruined land. 
The game is planned to be released on Switch, Playstation, Xbox and PC.

----------

Subscribe for coming updates!
Official Website: http://www.playafterimage.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/N6WBvZzPtS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayAfterimage
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/PlayAfterimage Reddit:https://www.reddit.com/r/afterimage
